languages.text: {n}Суровое лицо Капеллана озаряет теплая улыбка.{/n} "Целехонька, Ваша Светлость, я ее берегу. Всего ничего времени прошло, а она мне уже как родная, да и сама девчонка ко мне прикипела. За занятия судоходством взялась охотно, да и считать умеет уже лучше меня — растет настоящий торговый капитан!"

{n}A warm smile brightens Chaplain's rough features.{/n} "Safe and sound in my care, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Barely any time has passed, and I already think of her as my own, and the girl herself clings to me. She took to learning the ways of voidfaring with gusto, and she is already better at numbers than me — a true trade captain in the making!"
languages.original_text: {n}Суровое лицо Капеллана озаряет теплая улыбка.{/n} "Целехонька, Ваша Светлость, я ее берегу. Всего ничего времени прошло, а она мне уже как родная, да и сама девчонка ко мне прикипела. За занятия судоходством взялась охотно, да и считать умеет уже лучше меня — растет настоящий торговый капитан!"

She took to learning the ways of voidfaring with gusto, and she is already better at numbers than me — a true trade captain in the making!"

languages.text: {n}牧师粗粝的脸上露出了温暖的笑容。{/n}“这个姑娘在我的照料下安然无恙，大人。我还没照顾她多久，就已经把她当成我的亲生女儿了，她也很亲近我。她正在兴致勃勃地学习航行相关的知识，而且她在计算方面已经比我强了！她是个当贸易船长的料，只是羽翼未丰，仍在不断成长！”
languages.original_text: {n}A warm smile brightens Chaplain's rough features.{/n} "Safe and sound in my care, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Barely any time has passed, and I already think of her as my own, and the girl herself clings to me. She took to learning the ways of voidfaring with gusto, and she is already better at numbers than me — a true trade captain in the making!"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师粗粝的脸上露出了温暖的笑容。{/n}“这个姑娘在我的照料下安然无恙，大人。我还没照顾她多久，就已经把她当成我的亲生女儿了，她也很亲近我。她正在兴致勃勃地学习航行相关的知识，而且她在计算方面已经比我强了！她是个当贸易船长的料，只是羽翼未丰，仍在不断成长！”

languages.text: {n}Ein warmes Lächeln erhellt Ordenspriesters raue Gesichtszüge.{/n} "Sicher und wohlbehalten in meiner Obhut, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es ist kaum Zeit vergangen, und doch sehe ich sie schon als mein an, und das Mädchen selbst klammert sich an mich. Sie lernt mit Begeisterung die Raumfahrerei, und sie kann jetzt schon besser mit Zahlen umgehen als ich — sie wird einmal einen prächtigen Handelscaptain abgeben!"
languages.original_text: {n}A warm smile brightens Chaplain's rough features.{/n} "Safe and sound in my care, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Barely any time has passed, and I already think of her as my own, and the girl herself clings to me. She took to learning the ways of voidfaring with gusto, and she is already better at numbers than me — a true trade captain in the making!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein warmes Lächeln erhellt Ordenspriesters raue Gesichtszüge.{/n} "Sicher und wohlbehalten in meiner Obhut, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es ist kaum Zeit vergangen, und doch sehe ich sie schon als mein an, und das Mädchen selbst klammert sich an mich. Sie lernt mit Begeisterung die Raumfahrerei, und sie kann jetzt schon besser mit Zahlen umgehen als ich — sie wird einmal einen prächtigen Handelscaptain abgeben!"

languages.text: {n}Un sourire chaleureux vient égayer les traits habituellement sévères de Chapelain.{/n} « Elle se porte comme un charme, Votre Seigneurie. Je la considère déjà comme ma propre fille, et elle semble s'être beaucoup attachée à moi. Elle fait preuve d'un enthousiasme à toute épreuve pour apprendre la navigation stellaire, et pour ne rien vous cacher, elle maîtrise déjà mieux les nombres que moi... De la graine de capitaine ou je ne m'y connais pas ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A warm smile brightens Chaplain's rough features.{/n} "Safe and sound in my care, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Barely any time has passed, and I already think of her as my own, and the girl herself clings to me. She took to learning the ways of voidfaring with gusto, and she is already better at numbers than me — a true trade captain in the making!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire chaleureux vient égayer les traits habituellement sévères de Chapelain.{/n} « Elle se porte comme un charme, Votre Seigneurie. Je la considère déjà comme ma propre fille, et elle semble s'être beaucoup attachée à moi. Elle fait preuve d'un enthousiasme à toute épreuve pour apprendre la navigation stellaire, et pour ne rien vous cacher, elle maîtrise déjà mieux les nombres que moi... De la graine de capitaine ou je ne m'y connais pas ! »

languages.text: {n}Una cálida sonrisa aflora en el hosco rostro de Capellán.{/n} «¡Sana y salva bajo mi tutela, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Aunque ha pasado poco tiempo, ya pienso en la muchacha como si fuera mía, y ella tampoco parece querer separarse de mí. Es una estudiante consumada en todo lo relacionado con navegar por el vacío y ya me ha superado en matemáticas... ¡como capitana mercante, tiene futuro!».
languages.original_text: {n}A warm smile brightens Chaplain's rough features.{/n} "Safe and sound in my care, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Barely any time has passed, and I already think of her as my own, and the girl herself clings to me. She took to learning the ways of voidfaring with gusto, and she is already better at numbers than me — a true trade captain in the making!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una cálida sonrisa aflora en el hosco rostro de Capellán.{/n} «¡Sana y salva bajo mi tutela, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Aunque ha pasado poco tiempo, ya pienso en la muchacha como si fuera mía, y ella tampoco parece querer separarse de mí. Es una estudiante consumada en todo lo relacionado con navegar por el vacío y ya me ha superado en matemáticas... ¡como capitana mercante, tiene futuro!».

languages.text: {n}教戒官の無骨な顔に、温かい笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「安心してお預けください、陛下。長い時間を過ごしたわけではありませんが、私はすでに彼女を自分の子だと思っていますし、彼女自身もまた私になついています。彼女はヴォイドフェアリングのやり方を熱心に学んでいます。数字に関してはすでに私よりも強いです！」
languages.original_text: {n}A warm smile brightens Chaplain's rough features.{/n} "Safe and sound in my care, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Barely any time has passed, and I already think of her as my own, and the girl herself clings to me. She took to learning the ways of voidfaring with gusto, and she is already better at numbers than me — a true trade captain in the making!"

languages.text: {n}Papaz'ın kaba hatları, yüzündeki samimi tebessümle parlıyor.{/n} "Benim himayemde, güvende {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Henüz hiç vakit geçmese de onu kendimden biri gibi görüyorum. Kız da bana bağlandı. Uçsuz seyahatinin inceliklerini hevesle öğreniyor. Sayılarla arası iyi, beni geçti bile. Tam bir tacir kaptan olacak!"
languages.original_text: {n}A warm smile brightens Chaplain's rough features.{/n} "Safe and sound in my care, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Barely any time has passed, and I already think of her as my own, and the girl herself clings to me. She took to learning the ways of voidfaring with gusto, and she is already better at numbers than me — a true trade captain in the making!"
